function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious disease sensitivity to UV light","Impact":"Ineffective disinfection techniques","Mitigation":"Implementing additional disinfection methods","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Researchers, healthcare workers, public","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Differences in virus survival assays","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of virus sensitivity","Mitigation":"Standardizing the assessment methods","Technologies":"Virus survival assay standardization protocols","People":"Research laboratories, public health organizations","Owner":"Scientific community"},{"Description":"Similar UV sensitivity across coronaviruses","Impact":"Assuming uniform sensitivity to UV disinfection","Mitigation":"Conducting specific sensitivity studies for each strain","Technologies":"Coronavirus strain-specific UV sensitivity testing methods","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare facilities"}]}
